Class Empire

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpsc3720.contactserver.Empire

  • public class Empire
extends java.lang.Object
    Empire represents and empire instance in the Game.
    Author:
    Matthew Higgins, Ella Kokinda, Chris levesque, Keven "Beans" Hayes

    • Constructor Detail

      • Empire

        public Empire()
        An empire will have a specific id number and name or title. Each empire will also have a list of associated ship numbers that any user in the empire can use.
